summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney regarding travel arrangements for a fact witness in the Ghislaine Maxwell trial. It discusses scheduling the witness's travel to testify, potential date changes, and a request to house the witness at the same hotel as another witness (referred to as 'M').

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: Author of the email, coordinating travel for a fact witness in the Ghislaine Maxwell trial.

events.title: Potential Witness Testimony Date
events.description: A fact witness in the Maxwell trial is expected to testify on this date, or possibly on December 6, 2021.

events.title: Alternative Witness Testimony Date
events.description: Alternative date for the fact witness to testify in the Maxwell trial.

keyFacts: The document is a travel request for a fact witness in the Ghislaine Maxwell trial.
The witness is a mother, and a request is made to house her at the same hotel as another witness (referred to as 'M').
The email indicates the prosecution's active preparation for witness testimony in late 2021.
